basic.floral_language:
Pyrus pyrifolia
Floriography: pure, simple, soft 
Pear is a kind of deciduous trees, plant stature is strong and pretty. Leaf blade elliptic, margin finely serrate. Flowering is before the blade open. Flowers are delicate and cabinet, petals of five, color is like white snow, from a distance, and clusters of white flowers, pure and flawless. It is usually in the park, garden, etc. 
Pear flower like plenty of sunshine, properly covered under strong light. Natural flowering from April to May, ornamental period lasts 2 to 3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Moderately resistant to drought, water thoroughly after soil dries
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, top-dressing before and after flowering and defoliation
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
